attributes.additional_details:
Charge the government with Fiscal support in the form of food vouchers on a monthly basis to allow low/medium  income families to exchange for food based Items including fruit / veg / protein. This would allow families to afford to buy Fresh Fruit / Veg / Meat to improve diets and eradicate the rise in Rickets and  Other malnutrition based conditions conditions quickly emerging in this country. The vouchers would prohibit the sale of tobacco / alchohol or any other non essential Items.
Whilst supporting starving around the world is a necessary task especially when natural disasters occur we should onl  y provide emergency aid until Starvation / Malnutrition has been wiped out here. T
